verses.name: John 12:5
verses.text: Why was not this ointment sold for three hundred pence, and given to the poor?

verses.name: John 12:6
verses.text: This he said, not that he cared for the poor; but because he was a thief, and had the bag, and bare what was put therein.

verses.name: John 12:7
verses.text: Then said Jesus, Let her alone: against the day of my burying hath she kept this.

verses.name: John 12:8
verses.text: For the poor always ye have with you; but me ye have not always.
